extension.summary: Nakamori - allows to interact with your Anime collection (via ShokoServer)
extension.description: Nakamori gives you the ability to interact with your Anime collection (via ShokoServer) for Kodi-enabled devices. You are able to use many of the commands available to Desktop right from inside Kodi, such as marking watched status, voting, rescanning and rehashing files, and more!
extension.disclaimer: This plugin to work require working ShokoServer instance. https://shokoanime.com
